description: The aide spreads a campaign map on the table. Candlelight glints off brass buttons and ink bottles. Döbeln, struggling to rise, points weakly toward Jutas marked on the map. His expression hardens — fever or not, orders must be given.
narration: ‘We march at dawn… Jutas will be our stand.’

dialogs.text: Mark Jutas. Tell Gyllenbögel to prepare the men — we march at first light.

info: Page 4 – Döbeln Sick in Nykarleby. PageType: 4). Scene (panel 3): Döbeln issuing orders from bed, map illuminated by candlelight.
